name: Throw Thyself
description:
Pick from 4 mighty gods from myth and literally throw yourself at your friends in this chaotic 2.5d arena brawler from Argonauts. Use each Gods unique God power to give yourself an edge to take out your opponents in one Mighty Blow! Hitting a weapon instead of the body will send both of you flying away, here the best defense really is offense.

Local multiplayer 2-4 players.
Controllers required.

RECOMMENDED
This game can be played online using software like Parsec. Has been tested with Parsec and works well!

Throw Thyself was a major project made by students at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment in Sydney. It was made over the course of 16 weeks which included Pre-Production all the way to its current state.
